sqlMap.update: update useTimeLog set logoutTime = now() where id = #id# and loginTime = #loginTime# and licenseKey = #licenseKey#;
sqlMap.select: select id,ip from useTimeLog where logoutTime = '0000-00-00 00:00:00' and licenseKey = #licenseKey# and grade = 3;
select * from useTimeLog where licenseKey = #licenseKey# and id = #id# and loginTime = #loginTime#;
